Extract the ggplot2 design content of a file.

get_ggplot_element_design.Rd

Extract the ggplot2 design content of a file.

get_ggplot_element_design(name_ggplot_element, file_content)

Arguments

name_ggplot_element

Character. Name of the ggplot2 element, as defined in theme.

file_content

List. Content of the Figma file, as returned by get_file_content.

Value

List. The ggplot2 element properties.

Examples

file_content <- get_file_content(file_key = "wRqIvMmymzSPuj0sEhnORb",
                                 acess_token = Sys.getenv("FIGMA_TOKEN"))
#> ✔ Content of the file ggplot2 templating has been successfully extracted.

get_ggplot_element_design(name_ggplot_element = "panel_background",
                          file_content = file_content)
#> $fill_color
#> [1] "#5FBDDE"
#> 
#> $fill_opacity
#> [1] 0.6
#> 
#> $stroke_color
#> [1] "#D29F9F"
#> 
#> $stroke_opacity
#> [1] 1
#> 
#> $stroke_weight
#> [1] 4
#> 

get_ggplot_element_design(name_ggplot_element = "panel_grid",
                          file_content = file_content)
#> $stroke_color
#> [1] "#F5F5F5"
#> 
#> $stroke_opacity
#> [1] 1
#> 
#> $stroke_weight
#> [1] 0.4
#>
